item.text: When Jesus had finished saying these things, he looked upward to heaven and said, “Father, the time has come. Glorify your Son, so that your Son may glorify you—

<st data-num="2531">just as</st> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> over <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">humanity</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he may <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> they <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, the <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> <st data-num="228" class="">true</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glorified</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> by <st data-num="5048" class="">completing</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> you <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>.<n id="2" />
And now, Father, glorify me at your side with the glory I had with you before the world was created.
“I have revealed your name to the men you gave me out of the world. They belonged to you, and you gave them to me, and they have obeyed your word.

<st data-num="3568" class="">Now</st> they <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st><n id="2" /> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> the <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">accepted</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="230" class="">really</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="1831" class="">came</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="2065" class="">praying</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">on behalf of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">praying</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">on behalf of</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4012">on behalf of</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">those</st> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everything</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1699" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="1510">belongs to</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">you</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> everything <st data-num="4674" class="">you</st> have belongs to <st data-num="1699" class="">me</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I have been <st data-num="1392" class="">glorified</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="4" />

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">safe</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3739">that</st> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> one.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">safe</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5442">watched over</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739">that</st> you have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="3762">Not one</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> was <st data-num="622" class="">lost</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">one destined</st> for <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> could be <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> I am <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="2980" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> they may <st data-num="2192" class="">experience</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">completed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> has <st data-num="3404" class="">hated</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.<n id="3" />

I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">asking</st> you <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">out of</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">safe</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4190">evil one</st>.<n id="2" />

They do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="37" class="">Set</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="37" class="">apart</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth;</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="2531">Just as</st> you <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2504">so I</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.<n id="1" />
And I set myself apart on their behalf, so that they too may be truly set apart.
“I am not praying only on their behalf, but also on behalf of those who believe in me through their testimony,

<st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> they will <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">and I</st> am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. I pray<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> will <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

The <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> I have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> they may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st>—
I in them and you in me—that they may be completely one, so that the world will know that you sent me, and you have loved them just as you have loved me.
“Father, I want those you have given me to be with me where I am, so that they can see my glory that you gave me because you loved me before the creation of the world.

<st data-num="1342" class="">Righteous</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> if the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3778">these men</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
I made known your name to them, and I will continue to make it known, so that the love you have loved me with may be in them, and I may be in them.”
